mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(member_id, product_no, product_count) VALUES #{member_id}, #{product_no}, #{product_count}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE member_id=#{member_id} AND product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET product_count=#{product_count} WHERE member_id=#{member_id} AND product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE cart WHERE member_id=#{member_id} AND product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM cart WHERE member_id=#{member_id}

SELECT m.member_id, p.product_brand, p.product_name, p.product_mainimg, p.product_no, p.product_price, p.product_stock, c.product_count FROM member m, product p, cart c WHERE m.member_id = #{member_id}
